name: Bomb it! Bounce Masters
description:
Rise up against boredom and challenge yourself in the most addicting throwing game out there!
How far can you bounce? Test your reflex! Play Bomb it! Bounce Masters now!

Tap and launch your awesome robot and be ready to master the most fun and addicting throwing game you’ve ever played.

Start your journey in the exciting Tetrapolis where you test yourself by choosing the perfect moment to TAP AND THROW your personalised robot in the air.
MASTER the launch and try to bounce as far as you can avoiding obstacles, smashing through the city as you fly!

Awesome FEATURES:
- UPGRADE your robot and bring the game to the new level.
- UNLOCK new challenges as you progress in the most addicting game out there.
- DISCOVER new exciting areas of the city (warehouse, cyberpunk district and much more) that will reveal themselves as you progress.
- TEST your reflex and aiming skills while you try to avoid obstacles on your way.
- MASTER the game and rise up through the score chart Aim high! Have a blast trying to bounce forever!

Bounce forever, fly as far as you can and try to master the game while having a blast.
Challenge yourself in this mega simple, but hard to master game which you can enjoy everywhere you are.
Are you ready to start the best throwing game you’ve ever tried? Play Bomb it! Bounce Masters and join the real bounce madness today!

Pick up the challenge and enjoy playing endlessly! Will you rise up to the challenge?
